# Question 2. Are different soil chemical compositions associating with destructive forces?

##Introduction

## The analysis

Load packages
```{r}
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
library(ggtree)
library(vegan)
library(ape)
```




```{r}
#in Soil-mates write.csv 
#can see En.csv in Data folder
#general not working why?
#en <- read.csv("/./Data/En.csv")
en <- read.csv("/Users/laurynjoslin/Dropbox/Soil-Mates/Data/En.csv")
```

```{r}
summary(en)
```

```{r}
#Destructive forces summary

#No.Fires - number of fires either 1, 2, 3 or 4
#Clearcut- is it clearcut yes = 1, no = 0
#Salvage - was it salvage logged - yes = 1, no = 0


```


```{r}
en$no_fires <- as.character(en$No.Fires)
```





```{r}
ggplot(en)+
  geom_boxplot(aes(x = no_fires, y = log10(Ammonium.Nitrogen)))
```
```{r}
ggplot(en)+
  geom_boxplot(aes(x = no_fires, y = Organic.Carbon))
```

```{r}
ggplot(en)+
  geom_boxplot(aes(x = no_fires, y = Nitrate.Nitrogen))
```

```{r}
ggplot(en)+
  geom_boxplot(aes(x = no_fires, y = log10(Phosphorus.Colwell )))
```
